channel.title: Posts on Subhrajit Das
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Subhrajit Das

item.title: DigitsOnTurbo: Optimizing Large Number Arithmetic Operations
item.description: This project is part of my M.Tech Thesis at IIT Gandhinagar, exploring optimizations for arithmetic operations on large numbers.

item.title: About Me
item.description: About Me নমস্কার! আমি শুভ্রজিৎ, ভারতের ইন্ডিয়ান ইনস্টিটিউট অফ টেকনোলজি গান্ধীনগরের দ্বিতীয় বর্ষের এম.টেক ছাত্র। আমি কম্পিউটার সায়েন্স, বিশেষ করে কম্পিউটার সিস্টেমস ভালোবাসি। Hello there! I’m Subhrajit, a second-year M.Tech student at the Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar, India. I love Computer Science, especially Computer Systems. Skills I’m learning skills related to Computer Systems, especially working with performance optimization. Hobbies Traveling Experimenting with anything Languages I Speak/Write বাংলা (Mother Tongue) हिंदी English संस्कृत (Learnt in School Curriculum) Programming Language/Tools I Know Languages: C, C++, Java, MATLAB, Go, Python, R, Prolog, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSP, SQL, Kotlin Tools/Libraries/Simulators: Git, Bash, Wireshark, Docker, GDB, Valgrind, perf, AVX, OpenMP, MPI, gRPC, NS2, Mininet Operating Systems: Linux/Unix, Windows, MacOS Feel free to explore my website to learn more about my work and projects.
